name: refund_deposit
attributes: # [doc = " deposit_account.owner と ctx.accounts.requester.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let deposit = & mut ctx . accounts . deposit_account ;
send_funds (& ctx . accounts . system_program , & ctx . accounts . vault_account , & ctx . accounts . requester , amount ,) ? ;

name: reset_deposit
attributes: # [doc = " DepositAccount.amount を 0 にリセットし、refund_count をインクリメント"]
body: deposit . refund_count = deposit . refund_count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

name: send_funds
attributes: # [doc = " system_program::transfer CPI を使って Lamports を移動"]
body: let cpi_accounts = system_program :: Transfer { from : from . to_account_info () , to : to . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (system_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: deposit_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して照合すべき"]

fields.name: vault_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保証金保管用 Vault アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: requester
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 返却をリクエストするユーザー（署名者）"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この保証金を預けたユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: amount
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 預託中の Lamports 残高"]

fields.name: refund_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 返却が実行された回数"]
